name: 探險軍狐棋 Adventure Army-Fox Chess
name_original: 探險軍狐棋 Adventure Army-Fox Chess
description:
探險軍狐棋Ver3.0  

作者:大樹 
簡介:改編自西瓜棋的2或3人對弈遊戲+單人對決遊戲  

玩法說明:目前具有3+1種地圖，依不同地圖可供2至3人同遊，遊戲內有說明書，另含一相同素材改編之單人對決遊戲。

控制：↑、↓、←、→、z、x、點擊

Adventure Army-Fox Chess Ver3.0

Author: Dashu
Introduction: 2 or 3-player chess game adapted from Watermelon Chess + single-player duel game

How to play: There are currently 3+1 maps, which can be played by 2 to 3 people according to different maps. There is a manual in the game, and a single-player duel game adapted from the same material is included.

Controls:↑, ↓, ←, →, z, x, click
